Reviews.Title: I like it so much
Reviews.Author: Daniel U.
Reviews.Content: i like this phone. I recommend this phone. it's really nice for the price. The white color it so nice.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Giovanni S.
Reviews.Content: The Samsung galaxy fame is dual Sim. First problem it came in Chinese with Chinese owners manual. (2) One of the Sim's slots is is very small,so two use two Sim's one has to be cut down in order to use two Sim

Reviews.Title: Product is misleading and not as advertised by samsung
Reviews.Author: santy
Reviews.Content: Joycell did not display the real information about the product which is Samsung GT-6812i, it lakes feature like FM radio with RDS and its android crashes even your software is updated. Its nither camera phone not music phone, waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: Hmmmm
Reviews.Author: Amina Jones "book butterfly"
Reviews.Content: This phone is not what was advertised. I'm unable to access google play to download apps. One of the sim slots is for a micro sim and the other is just a regular sim. Battery dies quickly.

Reviews.Title: Onle one SIM card was standard
Reviews.Author: shipsurveyor
Reviews.Content: The seller emailed and confirmed that BOTH SIM card slots were the standard size - they weren't. One was standard the other a micro SIM card slot. This made the phone useless

Reviews.Title: it never worked!!!
Reviews.Author: cecilia
Reviews.Content: it doesn't work. I could never use it. In Argentina the cell company says that it doesn't recognize the net service and I bought it unlocked!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Don`t buy any product in this store and in Amazon
Reviews.Author: Mariana Herrmann
Reviews.Content: My sister bought this cel from Samsung for me when was wore to the Usa.I'm from Brazil and this cel came with problem, google account don`t sync and I can not get any app.I took it on Samsung, which did not do anything and had terrible service. I contacted Amazon, they returned me the money and told me to return the device but not sent to me instructions and labels to do that. They made another charge on my credit card without answering my email and without my authorization. I took the unit back to the USA and the American Samsung says that the device is not from USA and there is nothing to do. Run away from this store and from Amazon. Very bad service.

Reviews.Title: bad seller, no real products, no returns.
Reviews.Author: Gian
Reviews.Content: is s6812i china economic version, no camera front, no flash no sensor aproximity, no connect at google play, no 3g. camera is 3 mp.
